guest.name: Sahil Mansuri
guest.title: CEO & Founder
guest.background: Founder of the world's largest online sales community. Former sales leader at Glassdoor (closed Facebook, Google, Microsoft) and Meltwater. Expert in B2B sales strategy, particularly during economic downturns.
guest.background_zh: 全球最大销售社区 Bravado 的创始人兼 CEO。曾任 Glassdoor 销售高管（亲自签下了 Facebook、Google 和 Microsoft 等大客户）及 Meltwater 销售冠军。他是 B2B 销售策略专家，尤其擅长经济下行周期的销售实战。

episodeSummary: In this episode, Sahil Mansuri breaks down how B2B sales strategies must fundamentally pivot during an economic downturn. He argues against the 'growth at all costs' mindset, advocating instead for conservative forecasting, restructuring compensation to prioritize retention, and leveraging proprietary insights to close enterprise deals.
episodeSummary_zh: 在本期节目中，Sahil Mansuri 深度剖析了 B2B 销售策略在经济下行周期中应如何根本性转型。他反对“不惜一切代价追求增长”的心态，主张采用保守的预测模型，重构薪酬体系以优先考虑客户留存，并利用独家洞察来搞定企业级大单。
